answers.answer: I am 34 weeks this past week has been morning sickness every morning I stopped having it at 26 weeks and once I hit 33 weeks it has came back and I get a feverish feeling too even when its cool in my house hormones lol and I have gotten migraines more often than I usually do since being pregnant

I have had the same thing since my third trimester started. I know it ***** :( try eating smaller meals and include protein in all of them. Thats what i was told to do and its worked surprisingly well!!

Nausea can be normal caus your body is producing more hormones. Having constant headaches is not, it can a sign of preeclampsia as well as sudden weight gain and swelling. I would talk to your doctor ASAP cause preeclampsia can be dangerous and lead to eclampsia.

In my case I have always had migrianesbreal bad ones but I had to stop taking my dialy prescribed med which helps prevent them  and instead take a low disoge of Tylenol since they have incteased but i only take it when I get one I have actually lost weight due to morning sickness started out atv189 went to 194 back down to 192 and I am now 191 my doctor is keeping tabs on these things since it is associated with preeclampsia but so far so good everything is good baby is healthy and have ate smaller meals and snacks since pregnant due to nasuea with or/w/o puking  and my doctor has limited my active time spent being active due to my getting hot real easily and let's just say it gets really hot at the place I used to work  even with the doors open ir big fabs going why the boss does ten minute break for everyone every thirty minutes  just means more pay  since breaks are included into your work hours. I would still be working if my doctor was OK with it but he is not  it just ***** but you have to do what's Best for you and the baby

question: Tomorrow I'll be 33 weeks pregnant. I never really had much morning sickness but the past week or so I've been getting really naesous and sometimes I feel feverish. I've also gotten headaches more. Is this normal?? I've gotten so big lately and there's so much pressure. I just really wish this pregnancy would be over soon. Any thoughts?
